name: Sklearn Ridge Regression
description: Ridge Regression, solves a regression model where the loss function is the linear least squares function and regularization is given by the l2-norm.

fields.name: targetCol
fields.title: Target Column
fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.name: featureCols
fields.title: Feature Columns
fields.description: Feature columns of type - all numeric, boolean and vector

fields.name: alpha
fields.title: Alpha
fields.description: Constant that multiplies the L2 term, regularization strength.

fields.name: fitintercept
fields.title: Fit Intercept
fields.description: Whether to calculate the intercept for this model.

fields.name: normalize
fields.title: Normalize
fields.description: This parameter is ignored when `fit_intercept` is set to False. If True, the regressors X will be normalized before regression by subtracting the mean and dividing by the l2-norm.

fields.name: maxiter
fields.title: Max Iterations
fields.description: Maximum number of iterations for conjugate gradient solver.

fields.name: solver
fields.title: Solver
fields.description: Solver to use in the computational routines.

fields.name: randomstate
fields.title: Random State
fields.description: The seed of the pseudo random number generator to use when shuffling the data for the solver.'
